channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- Tivoli Federated Identity Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- Tivoli Federated Identity Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-1320|2024-08-05T13:32:28.402Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20federated%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Federated Identity Manager 6.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 125732.
